description: The lives of the kids at Degrassi Community School dealing with the serious and sometimes taboo issues that plague teenagers.
keywords: high school,vito russo test passed,alliance atlantis,punctuation in title,toronto ontario canada
name: Degrassi: The Next Generation

review.name: I really like the show...but not the channel that broadcasts it.
review.reviewBody: Degrassi: The Next Generation is a really awesome show. It deals with real problems that teens face, such as homosexuality, violence, sex, drugs, and many other topics. My favorite characters are definitely Paige and JT. They add much humor to the show. The one thing I don't like is the fact that in the states, The-N edits the episodes. We didn't even get to see one of the episodes, because The-N thinks that the people of the states are too weak to handle a little maturity. Many of the shows do deal with mature topics, but we can handle them just fine, thank you. Anyway, if you don't watch Degrassi: The Next Generation, then you should start watching it!

trailer.description: Trailer for this dramatic show set around a high school
trailer.name: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Season Six
